title: Ability to select some templates when creating a new dashboard
description:
Users see a blank canvas that is scary.

The workaround from Ben and others have been to share dashboards with them. We later renamed those as "shared templates".

Acceptance criteria

* When creating a new dashboard, the user sees a list of possible templates they can choose from
* This list is configurable per client
* Shared templates are renamed to something else TBD
* Existing clients (VZ, CBL) TBD
